item.title: Today's Thesis Proposal
item.author: Author
item.description:
Today I participated in the thesis proposal through the Tencent Meeting.

The original plan was to start at 1:30 p.m. I don’t know why we waited until 2 p.müò∂. There were 24 students and 3 judges in this thesis proposal this afternoon. I was number 12 and waited until 4 p.m to finally get my turn. Overall, it went relatively smoothly, but there was a teacher who was studying computer network coincidentally, and my topic involved a lot of network stuff, so I was questioned closely.

After my turn, because the teacher didn’t say we could withdraw, I just continued to stay in the meeting to watch others. An unnamed student who was recommended to study at the Institute of Computing Technology, Chinese Academy of Sciences for postgraduate study without examination, his graduation project was in cooperation with Huawei. He said that the results of his graduation project would beat the previous work of his supervisor, and he was determined to submit a paper to the top conference as wellüëç.

Such excellent classmates inspire me to do my own work better, keep working hardüëç.

item.description: The flour may be less, it’s not as good as last time. Not bad.

item.title: Pingyao Ancient City
item.author: Author
item.description:
A few days ago, I went to Pingyao Ancient City. The entire ancient city basically preserves the original appearance of the Ming and Qing Dynasties. It’s very spectacular to gaze into the distance from the city wall. There are many snacks, my favorite is Pingyao beef and wantuo!

I didn’t take any good-looking photos, and here are two I took on the southern city wall.

item.title: I Went to Tiananmen Today
item.author: Author
item.description: I went out for a walk today and took some photos. The blue sky! Fantastic!

item.title: Google Has Indexed My Website
item.author: Author
item.description:
Google has indexed my website! At present, I have also submitted the sitemap to Baidu and Bing, waiting to be indexed.

Now my website is gradually getting on track, so I am going to write an article next week to review how my website was built.

item.title: Graduation Project Starts Now
item.author: Author
item.description:
This week my school started the work of the graduation project, and now I have determined the topic and officially started my graduation project.

Topic selection

I already selected a topic before, which was proposed to me by my master tutor. It’s about cyber security. I think it’s quite appropriate. On the one hand, I can learn some knowledge about cyber security in advance, on the other hand, I can also complete my graduation project. This is killing two birds with one stone.

Meeting

After the mobilization meeting of the graduation project, I met with my adviser. He hosted a short meeting for us and talked a lot. It‚Äôs nothing. The only thing is that a WeCom group was created, and he became the “ÂØ®‰∏ª (zh√†izh«î, brigand chief)”.

Report

Although I selected a topic before, I still need to think about it seriously. After all, the graduation project is not so casual. My adviser posted some reference topics in the group, all of which are quite classic. However, that topic is very new to me. I have never worked in this field before. In general, I prefer the topic of cyber security, and my master tutor also hopes that I will complete this topic very well. So I reported it to my adviser.

Discussion

What the adviser said:

The È¢òÁõÆ (t√≠m√π, It means “title” or “topic” in Chinese.) is incomplete.

Write a complete one.

Okay, I described my topic more completely, waiting for his opinion. The message has been read, but there has been no reply. It’s inexplicable, wouldn’t he forget it? The next day, I sent him a message and asked his opinion again, and suddenly received a 59 second voice message.

What the adviser said:
… Yous is not a È¢òÁõÆ at all, yours is just a spoken expression. How could that be a È¢òÁõÆ? And the work you will do, to be honest, is too searchable. I can‚Äôt say… If I don‚Äôt see the specific content. Then what you do can be more or less. The requirements for you, I don‚Äôt know… If it‚Äôs low, it‚Äôs very simple and not too difficult; if it’s high, that’s a certain degree of difficulty, okay? Then you wrote so much, how could yours be a È¢òÁõÆ? Yours is Just a Spoken Expression! Your spoken expression, how can I decide for you? You want to determine it, can I decide a spoken expression for you? Can it be a È¢òÁõÆ? You can’t write a È¢òÁõÆ yourself, you ask me to decide? Deciding a spoken expression for you, is appropriate? Ok? After you‚Äôve thought about it yourself, we will have a basis for discussion. Otherwise, there is nothing to say!

I was stunned, he said mine is not a topic. Regardless of whether it is a topic or not, if he thinks mine is not a topic and¬†he has opinions or questions, couldn’t he tell me directly? I can modify or improve it! He keeps not replying, can I know what he thinks?

I experienced this situation for the first time since I was born, and I didn’t know what it meant to me. I also told my master tutor about this matter.

The first message she replied to was:
Why?

I also showed her the voice of my adviser, and she helped me determine a title. Here I suddenly discovered that there may be a misunderstanding. Does the “È¢òÁõÆ” mentioned by my adviser refer to the “title” or the “topic”? I checked the Modern Chinese Normative Dictionary, “È¢òÁõÆ” does have multiple meanings. He said that my “È¢òÁõÆ” was a “spoken expression”, and it seemed that the “È¢òÁõÆ” mentioned by him refers to the “title”.

If so, why didn’t he make it clear at the beginning that he was talking about a title?

Well, he said that I can’t write a title myself, and there is no basis for discussion. Then I sent him the determined title, hoping for further discussion. However, he still has nothing to say.

At that time, I felt that the “title” or “topic” may not be the key. I thought of him saying in the group, “from this class, the educational administration is going to start the graduation project management system”, “all through the system”, “leave traces”. “Moreover”, “qualification for the Washington Accord is in progress”, “advisers strictly control the quality of topics”. I thought it may not be easy for him to check the professional level and workload of this topic. After all, he is not researching cyber security, and there should be no similar topics in the past. He has been difficult to conclude, so he has nothing to say.

I told my master tutor what I thought, and she suggested that I explain it to him in more detail. Therefore, I wrote a document that was a bit like an opening report. I wrote out the specific tasks to be done, and also initially planned the time allocation for each task. I sent it to my adviser and asked him to¬†express his opinions directly¬†if¬†he had any questions.

Finally, my adviser started to discuss it with me.

What the adviser said:
You can submit it.

End

In any case, the topic has been determined, and now it’s time to complete the project.
